</issue>
</OperationOutcome>

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Business Identifier for research subject in a study

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: candidate | eligible | follow-up | ineligible | not-registered | off-study | on-study | on-study-intervention | on-study-observation | pending-on-study | potential-candidate | screening | withdrawn
